images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual for the email campaign, capturing the essence of winter in Istanbul with warm tones, showcasing a snowy cityscape, local culture, and winter elements like coffee and Turkish sweets.
AI-selected These destination images will highlight unique attractions of Istanbul during winter, featuring cozy cafes and winter activities, enhancing the inviting atmosphere of the campaign.
AI-selected These destination images will highlight unique attractions of Istanbul during winter, featuring cozy cafes and winter activities, enhancing the inviting atmosphere of the campaign.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of winter in Istanbul
assetRequirements.visual_style: warm tones with winter elements, showcasing snow and local culture
assetRequirements.content_context: a snowy cityscape of Istanbul with eastern lights, coffee, and Turkish sweets

assetRequirements.purpose: highlight the unique winter experience in Istanbul
assetRequirements.visual_style: cultural and atmospheric, focusing on cozy cafes and local delicacies
assetRequirements.content_context: images of cozy cafes and winter activities in Istanbul

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Зимний Стамбул ждет вас!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual for the email campaign, capturing the essence of winter in Istanbul with warm tones, showcasing a snowy cityscape, local culture, and winter elements like coffee and Turkish sweets.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
